Content:
CITES Certificate
For shipments from India to Australia involving endangered species (e.g., animal skins), send a CITES Certificate via Express to clear Australian customs.
Packing List
Not mandatory but recommended for multi-package shipments—include with invoice for clarity.
MSDS-NON DG
Goods under IATA Special Provisions A67 (e.g., batteries) need a Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS). Include an MSDS or Non-Dangerous Goods (NON DG) declaration—upload to IDIS—especially if transiting via UAE, to avoid delays.
Info About Section Header: Paperwork needed for shipping from India to Australia.
Simplified Form: - **CITES Certificate**: For wildlife items, send via Express from India.
- **Packing List**: Optional—add to invoice for multi-packages.
- **MSDS/NON DG**: For batteries, include MSDS or NON DG—upload to IDIS, especially via UAE.

Content:
Customs Clearance Process
The Australian Quarantine and Inspection Service (AQIS) screens all shipments from India. Incomplete invoices or goods needing permits (e.g., wood, food) incur inspection fees and delays. Words like ‘wood,’ ‘sample,’ ‘gift,’ ‘used,’ or ‘food’ trigger quarantine checks.
Post Office Boxes
No P.O. Box delivery—provide a full address and phone number.
Package Delivery
Air waybill (AWB) must list consignee name, phone, and address—not broker details.
Payment by Credit Card
Accepted for freight and import charges on delivery—check accepted cards with UPS Australia.
High Weight with Low Value Imports
Australian Customs may request Evidence of Money Price Paid (EMPP) if value seems low for weight (e.g., 100 kg ads for AUD 50). Declare fair market value for free items—non-compliance delays clearance.
Gifts & Samples
Gifts from India face duties (per India’s 2019 rule)—samples need material details or face quarantine.
Clearance Comments
Australian Customs randomly inspects 5% of shipments, delaying them 24-72 hours.
Import Charges
Under AUD 1,000 (FOB): no charges (except alcohol/tobacco). Over AUD 1,000: 10% GST, possible 5% duty, plus AUD 88 fee (or AUD 190 if over AUD 10,000).
Simplified Form: - **Quarantine**: AQIS checks all—fees for permits or words like ‘wood,’ ‘gift,’ ‘food.’
- **No P.O. Boxes**: Full address and phone required.
- **Credit Card**: OK for charges—confirm with UPS Australia.
- **Low Value**: High weight, low cost? Show EMPP or face delays.
- **Charges**: Under AUD 1,000 free (not alcohol/tobacco); over: 10% GST, 5% duty, AUD 88-190 fee.

Content: Service from India to Australia covers select cities—agents used in New South Wales, Victoria, Queensland, and Western Australia. Norfolk Island: use AU, postal code 2899, city Norfolk Island. No P.O. Box delivery—provide full address and phone. Rest days: Saturday, Sunday, Australian holidays. Time zone: GMT +10 (Spring), +9 (Fall). Language: English. Currency: AUD.
Simplified Form: - **Coverage**: Select cities—agents in NSW, VIC, QLD, WA.
- **No P.O. Boxes**: Full address and phone.

Content:
Duties and Taxes
Bill to India, Australia, or third party (needs name, country, account)—outside Australia adds a surcharge.
Payment Methods
Card, check, or cash bills only India.
Shipping Charges
Bill to India, Australia (with account), or third party (details needed).
Third-Party Billing
Australia-only shipments can’t bill to India unless EU-based with VAT ID.
Simplified Form: - **Duties/Taxes**: Bill to India, Australia, or third party—outside AU adds fee.
- **Shipping**: Bill to India, Australia (needs account), or third party.
- **Third-Party**: AU-only can’t bill India unless EU with VAT.

Content:
Samples
Invoices must list material composition—unclear samples face quarantine, fees to importer (or shipper if Free Domicile), 1-day delay.
Veterinary Products
Need an AQIS import permit.
Packing Materials
Straw banned—removed at importer’s cost, delays 48 hours to 2 weeks.
Shoes
Must be marked with origin and material.
Cosmetics
Over 250mg/kg lead needs Ministry approval (not hair products).
Jewelry
Under AUD 1,000 needs proof of payment (e.g., bank statement).
Vitamins
Full ingredients on invoice—customs may inspect.
Toys
Painted toys need ‘Paint not containing lead’ label.
Videos/CDs
Subject to censorship.
Tobacco
Needs written permission and import permit—arriving without seized.
Wood Products
Fumigated with certificate—non-compliant treated/destroyed. ISPM 15 required for packing.
Clothing
Labels with material and origin sewn in—visible on packaging if not transparent.
Pharmaceuticals
Need TGA import permit.
Used Items
Quarantine inspects all—minimum AUD 36 fee.
Dairy
Needs Dept of Agriculture permit.
Tires
Certificate proving no mosquitoes/larvae.
Taiwan Goods
Extra quarantine for Foot and Mouth Disease—case-by-case permits.
Phones
Portable phones need an import permit.
Food
Meat, dairy, fish need permits—labels with maker, ingredients, origin. Old fruit boxes repacked, delays apply. Minimum AUD 36 fee.
Textiles
Label with fabric and origin.
Coffee
Green beans need AQIS permit.
Supplements
Full ingredients—unverified/prohibited seized, fees apply.
Animal Skins
CITES-covered need export/import permits.
Tableware
Ceramic may be tested for lead.
Medicine
Unregistered banned—personal needs prescription, 3-month limit.
Software
List CD value and intellectual property—blanks noted.
Info About Section Header: Special rules for goods from India to Australia.

Content: No gift exemption in Australia—under AUD 1,000 (FOB) is duty/tax-free (except alcohol, tobacco, prohibited items).

Paperless Invoice - Imports
Australia accepts UPS Paperless Invoice for small packages from India.
Paperless Invoice - Exports
Available for exports from India.
Invoice
Include 1 original, 2 copies: goods description (new/used), material composition, currency (e.g., INR), unit/total value, Incoterms (e.g., FOB), origin (India), consignee phone. No-value items need a stated value.
Simplified Form: - **Invoice**: 1 orig, 2 copies—list goods (new/used), materials, INR, values, Incoterms, India origin, phone.

Content: From India: bonds, cash letters, manuscripts, maps, ads (business-related), tickets, reports, bids, checks (non-negotiable), blueprints, brochures, catalogs, charts, print-outs, credit cards, discs/diskettes (with data), intercompany data (non-commercial, not software, marked ‘Intercompany Data’ on AWB), mail, microfilm, pamphlets, passports, periodicals, photos, price lists, proposals, publications, spec sheets, tapes, transparencies, visa apps, drawings, cards, manuals, graphs, newsletters, newspapers.
Simplified Form: - **Documents**: Bonds, letters, manuscripts, maps, ads (business), tickets, reports, bids, checks, blueprints, brochures, catalogs, charts, print-outs, cards, discs (data), intercompany (non-commercial, marked), mail, microfilm, pamphlets, passports, periodicals, photos, prices, proposals, publications, specs, tapes, transparencies, visas, drawings, cards, manuals, graphs, newsletters, newspapers.

Content:
Alcohol
Via ISC only—NSW, VIC, ACT, SA, WA, TAS only (not QLD/NT). No de minimis—high duties, GST. List alcohol percentage.
Knives
Daggers/sharp need consignee permit—concealable banned.
Watches
Label watch, housing, movement with origin if different.
Lasers
Over 1mW needs police/import permit.
Electrical Equipment
Over 1 kg with motor from Turkey banned.
Toy Guns
Banned.
E-Cigarettes
Disposable/therapeutic banned—exceptions need ODC/TGA permits.
Lithium Batteries
UN3480 banned on Sydney flights—metal banned on Emirates. Delays via Dubai.
Asbestos
Targeted—declare ‘asbestos-free’ on invoice.
Surgical Masks/Ventilators
Prohibited since 2020 (HS 3822, 9018).
Yeast
Starter cultures need manufacturer declaration (no seed/grain/animal) or permit—else held.
Plants
Need permit, CITES if applicable—botanical names, no soil.
Personal Effects
Not shippable.
Batteries
Section I banned—Section II OK with UN38.3 summary.
Info About Section Header: Banned or restricted items from India to Australia.
Simplified Form: - **Alcohol**: ISC only—some states, high duties, list percentage.
- **Batteries**: UN3480/metal banned—Section II OK with docs.
- **Batteries**: Section I out—Section II with summary.

Content:
Saturday Delivery Available: Yes
Not in all areas—check Time in Transit. Extra charge applies.
Simplified Form: - **Saturday**: Yes, not everywhere—check tool, extra fee.

Content: Check Calculate Time and Cost for India-to-Australia details. Options: UPS Worldwide Express Saver, Expedited, Express Freight, Express. Not all reach every address.
Info About Section Header: Shipping services from India to Australia.
Simplified Form: - **Check Tool**: Use Calculate Time and Cost.

Content:
Military Shipments
Personal military effects need permits if not military-owned—normal duties apply. Military weapons for deployment need manifest, no permit.
Repaired Goods
Used items need quarantine—list ‘Repaired Goods,’ origin, duty on repair value.
Embassy Shipments
Need B615 form—1-day delay.
Wood Packing
ISPM 15-treated over 6mm—check origin authority.
Repair and Return
Export invoice: goods, serial, model, ‘Repair and Return,’ origin (India), value. Import: add warranty status, charges—duty-free if under warranty, else duty/GST on repair/freight.
Returned Goods
Used need quarantine—list ‘Returned Goods,’ origin.
Simplified Form: - **Military**: Personal needs permits—official weapons on manifest.
- **Repaired**: Used checked—list ‘Repaired,’ origin, duty on repair.
- **Repair/Return**: List goods, serial, ‘Repair and Return,’ India origin, value—add warranty, charges on return.

Content: De minimis: AUD 1,000 (FOB)—duty/tax-free except alcohol, tobacco, prohibited. Exports over USD 1,000 need formal clearance—extra day; jewelry over USD 500/piece needs waiver.
Simplified Form: - **Exports**: Over USD 1,000 formal, 1-day delay—jewelry over USD 500 needs waiver.

Content: Max weight: 70 kg (150 lbs). Max length: 274 cm (107.9 in). Max dimensions: 419.1 cm (165 in) combined (length + girth).
